Class AttributesUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xchain.framework.util.AttributesUtil

  • public class AttributesUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for Attribute related methods.
    Author:
    Christian Trimble, Devon Tackett, Josh Kennedy
    See Also:
    Attributes

    • Method Detail

      • getAttribute

        public static java.lang.String getAttribute(org.xml.sax.Attributes attributes,
                            java.lang.String namespaceUri,
                            java.lang.String localName)
        Get the attribute value.
        Parameters:
        attributes - The list of attributes to check.
        namespaceUri - The namespace of the attribute.
        localName - The local name of the attribute.
        Returns:
        The value of the attribute if found. Null if not found.

      • getAttribute

        public static java.lang.String getAttribute(org.xml.sax.Attributes attributes,
                            java.lang.String namespaceUri,
                            java.lang.String localName,
                            java.lang.String defaultValue)
        Get the attribute value.
        Parameters:
        attributes - The list of attributes to check.
        namespaceUri - The namespace of the attribute.
        localName - The local name of the attribute.
        defaultValue - The default value to use if the attribute could not be found.
        Returns:
        The value of the attribute if found. The given defaultValue if not found.

      • parseAttributeValueTemplate

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> parseAttributeValueTemplate(java.lang.String attributeValueTemplate)
                                                                    throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Parses an attribute value template into fixed and dynamic parts. This list will always start with a fixed part and then include alternating dynamic and fixed parts.
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException

      • evaluateAttributeValueTemplate

                                                              java.lang.Exception
        Evaluates an attribute value template using the provided JXPathContext object.
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        java.lang.Exception
